item.title: How to Download a Clean Windows ISO & Install from Scratch
item.category: "Windows 10" , "Windows 11" , "ISO file" , "Clean install" , "Media Creation Tool" , "Bootable USB" , "Installation media" , "BIOS" , "UEFI firmware" , "Custom installation" , "Product key" , "64-bit system" , "32-bit system" , "Rufus" , "ImgBurn" , "CDBurnerXP" , "HashCalc" , "MD5 & SHA Checksum Utility" , "System type"
